attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern,

As prospective adoptive parents waiting for our referral from Colombia, South
America, we would like to comment on the proposed fee increases in Docket ID
USCIS-2006-0044. In recent years the wait time for international adoptions has
increased in various countries, including Colombia. As a result, families like ours
have been required to file Form I-600A and obtain fingerprints more than once to
keep our petitions from expiring before our adoptions are completed. Significant
increases in these and other fees, as proposed, would further increase the
financial responsibility for adoptive families, sometimes twofold for a single
adoption.

Our desire is that many more children would be given the gift of loving parents and
families. We believe fee increases as proposed in the above docket will make it
more difficult for families of various incomes to pursue international adoption.

Thank you for considering our comments.

Respectfully submitted,
Allan and Robyn Zafft
Lee's Summit, MO
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Allan and Robyn Zafft
